long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ChatFlex
Transform your chat experience with the ultimate customisation tool. ChatFlex allows you to tailor your chat environment exactly to your liking, ensuring an optimal and more comfortable browsing and interaction experience. Whether you're coding, learning, or just chatting, make your chat sessions your own.

Features:

===== Customisable Chat Width =====
Adjust the width of the chat interface to match your screen size and personal preference. 

===== Maximum Width Setting =====
Set a maximum width for the chat to avoid overly stretched texts on larger screens.

===== Adaptable Code Block Width =====
Specify how the width of code blocks should be handled. Choose between matching the width of your chat or keeping them aligned to the content width.

Supports ChatGPT, Claude and Gemini!

Also available on Firefox:
https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/chatflex/

And Microsoft Edge:
https://microsoftedge.microsoft.com/addons/detail/chatflex/oicckedllcjcmkhonegnanciacbkclee
